"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/PageLayout/style.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/PageLayout/style.css","text":".health-buff-debuff-tracker-layout-main-area{width:100%;height:100%;padding:1em 2em 0}","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status":{"created":"20230219143648537","text":"OPMI is a biomedical ontology in the area of precision medicine and its related investigations. It is community-driven and developed by following the OBO Foundry ontology development principles. In OPMI, we treated medical condition status as a status, which is a realizable entitry. One major section of the branch is various diagnosis condition status. There are basically two types of diagnosis: one type diagnosis is treated as a condition status, the other is diagnosis (OGMS_0000073) as a type of clinical data item. One good example to illustrate the difference is the difference between primary and principal diagnoses. While these can be (and frequently are) the same diagnosis in practice, their definitions are distinct. While a principal diagnosis is the underlying cause of patient symptoms, the primary diagnosis is used for healthcare billing purposes and is a type of medical condition status. Reference: https://www.definitivehc.com/resources/glossary/primary-diagnosis","title":"$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status","tags":"$:/SuperTag/TraitTag","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","modified":"20230219145213110","url":"https://oscaf.sourceforge.net/tmo.html#tmo:Task","schema":"{ "type": "object", "properties": { "opmi_medicalConditionStatus": { "type": "string", "description": "The state or status at the point during the visit the diagnosis was given (admitting diagnosis, final diagnosis), whether the diagnosis was determined due to laboratory findings, if the diagnosis was exclusionary, or if it was a preliminary diagnosis, among others.", "default": "confirmedDiagnosis", "enum": [ "admissionDiagnosis", "causeOfDeath", "conditionToBeDiagnosedByProcedure", "confirmedDiagnosis", "contributoryCauseOfDeath", "deathDiagnosis", "dischargeDiagnosis", "postoperativeDiagnosis", "preliminaryDiagnosis", "preoperativeDiagnosis", "primaryDiagnosis", "referralDiagnosis", "resolvedCondition", "secondaryDiagnosis" ] } } }","wl-field-name-text":"schema"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption","code-body":"yes","text":"<>"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/captionCascade":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/captionCascade","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplateTitleFilter","list-before":"$:/config/ViewTemplateTitleFilters/system","text":"[tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff}then[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption]] [tag{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff}then[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/ViewTemplate/caption]]"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/AddNewItem":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/AddNewItem","text":"\procedure User data will be saved in the local-first way for privacy, the interface will be user-friendly, and potential future additions include data analysis features to further enhance users' understanding of their health conditions."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Name","text":"Health Buff Debuff Tracker"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/ShortName":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/ShortName","text":"Health Tracker"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Description","text":"Record health issues, medication usage, and process of recovery. Your personal health archive."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Configs/Description","text":"These settings let you customise the behaviour of "Health Buff Debuff Tracker" plugin."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/SetEnded":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/SetEnded","text":"Set Ended"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Medicine":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Medicine","text":"Medicine"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Medicine/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Medicine/Description","text":"Medicines you are taking, related to one of your buff/debuff/condition. Can be associated by adding a wiki link in the body of the buff tiddler etc."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/BodyCondition":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/BodyCondition","text":"Body Condition"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/BodyCondition/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/BodyCondition/Description","text":"Normal medical examination data such as "blood pressure" or "weight""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/AddNewItem":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/AddNewItem","text":"Add New Item"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Buff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Buff","text":"Buff"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Buff/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Buff/Description","text":"Good things that added to your body or health, like "Regular exercise", "Cyborg legs", "laser myopia surgery" or "encouraged by friends""},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/DeBuff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/DeBuff","text":"DeBuff"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/DeBuff/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/DeBuff/Description","text":"Bad things like "flu", "hair loss", "broken leg", etc."},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/HealthRecordSummary":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/HealthRecordSummary","text":"Health Record Summary"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/BackToDefaultLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/BackToDefaultLayout","text":"Back To Default Layout"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Navigation":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Navigation","text":"Navigation"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Usage":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/en-GB/Usage","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/ !! Basic Usage # Provide a <> layout, use `ctrl+shift+L` to switch to this view ## or open it using a layout launcher like <> on the sidebar # When the layout opens, there are a few buttons at the top ## On the left is a series of add buttons that, when clicked, jump back to the default layout and add new tiddlers ## On the right are buttons that jump directly back to the default layout # Once you've added a few tiddlers, a table of data is displayed at the bottom of the layout, listing the tiddlers you've added. ## Clicking on the title of a tiddler in the table will jump back to the default layout and open that entry !! Tags The following tags are used in this entry to indicate that the entry records a symptom or health condition, the add button actually creates the entry with these tags: <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/medicine]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/condition]]"> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!text}} /> {{!!caption}} - {{!!description}} You can make your own [ext[SuperTag|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]] by adding [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] tags to any tiddler. "},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Readme","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/ ! <> <> 用户数据将以本地优先的方式保存，以保护隐私，界面也将非常友好，未来还可能增加数据分析功能，以进一步提高用户对自身健康状况的了解。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Name":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Name","text":"健康增益和减益追踪器"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/ShortName":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/ShortName","text":"健康记录"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Description","text":"记录各种健康问题、药物使用情况和恢复过程。你的个人健康存档。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Configs/Description","text":"通过这些设置，您可以自定义「健康增益和减益追踪器」插件的行为。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/SetEnded":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/SetEnded","text":"设为结束"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Medicine":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Medicine","text":"药物"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Medicine/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Medicine/Description","text":"您正在服用的，与某个增益、减益、身体状态相关的药物。可以通过在增益条目等的正文添加链接的形式关联起来。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/BodyCondition":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/BodyCondition","text":"身体状态"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/BodyCondition/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/BodyCondition/Description","text":"「血压」或「体重」等正常情况"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/AddNewItem":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/AddNewItem","text":"添加新项目"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Buff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Buff","text":"增益"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Buff/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Buff/Description","text":"对你的身体或健康有益的事情，如「经常锻炼」、「机械腿」、「激光近视手术」或「朋友的鼓励」。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/DeBuff":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/DeBuff","text":"减益"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/DeBuff/Description":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/DeBuff/Description","text":"诸如「感冒」、「脱发」、「断腿」等不好的事情。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/HealthRecordSummary":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/HealthRecordSummary","text":"健康记录摘要"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/BackToDefaultLayout":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/BackToDefaultLayout","text":"返回默认布局"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Navigation":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Navigation","text":"导航"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Usage":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/zh-Hans/Usage","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\procedure lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/language/ !!基本用法 # 提供<>布局，使用 `ctrl+shift+L` 切换到该视图 ## 或使用侧边栏上的<>等布局启动器打开它 # 打开布局后，顶部有一些按钮 ## 左边是一系列添加按钮，点击后会跳转回默认布局，并添加新的条目 ## 右边是直接跳转回默认布局的按钮 # 等你添加了一些条目后，布局底部会显示一个数据表格，列出你添加的条目 ## 点击表格里的条目标题，会跳转回默认布局，并打开该条目 !! 标签 以下是本条目里用到的，用于表明条目记录了症状或健康情况的标签，添加按钮其实就是创建了带有这些标签的条目： <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/debuff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/buff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/medicine]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/tags/condition]]"> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!text}} /> {{!!caption}} - {{!!description}} 你可以通过给任意条目添加 [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] 标签来制作你自己的[ext[超级标签|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]]。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/HomePage":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/pages/HomePage","text":"
{{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/AddNewItem}} {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/health-buff-debuff-tracker/components/Navigation}}
<>
